page.title: 06Recreation.
page.content:
'In Beckington there is a football team and a cricket team. They play on the recreation ground. Also at the recreation field there are swings and a slide for the children to play on. There is a table tennis club in the village hall. There is also a 'break dance' group.
'At Brokers Wood there is a country park. You can go camping and go on nature trails. Also there is a bar-be-cue. There are lots of wild flowers growing. Most of the trees are British also there are 80 acres of woodland. There is also a lake with ducks, birds and geese. There is fishing in the lake.
'At Rudge there is a riding stable and two pubs called 'The Kicking Donkey' and 'The Full Moon'. '
